author: Phenix
title: ???? Cards, useless pieces
review:
Being a fan of Creationary, we picked up this booster to give it a try.  The biggest attraction was more cards to use, but after a few practice games, we have found the '?' cards to be mostly too difficult to play. 

Pros

  • More cards to try
  • Use for '?' tile on die
  • Challenging for those that are skilled

Cons

  • Pieces do not add to building versatility 
  • Many challenges are near impossible to create
  • Orange and green tiles do not have printed logos on them

All in all, a disappointing expansion.  A deck of cards would have been better, but with the same ?,??,??? Difficulty gradients.  

  A future expansion set that focuses on useful parts would be a better addition to the game experience.  We have modified our Creationary set with sideways building parts and a few unique pieces, ie sideways building bricks, brick ended hose, 1/4 curves, triangle with ball joint, etc that has improved play and made some builds less frustrating.
